description: Get a list of intents that meet the specified criteria.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bot that contains the intent.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot that contains the intent.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the language and locale of the intents to list. The string must match one of the supported locales. For more information, see Supported languages.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Determines the sort order for the response from the ListIntents operation. You can choose to sort by the intent name or last updated date in either ascending or descending order. The attribute to use to sort the list of intents. The order to sort the list. You can choose ascending or descending.

nested_params.name: attribute
nested_params.description: The attribute to use to sort the list of intents.

nested_params.name: order
nested_params.description: The order to sort the list. You can choose ascending or descending.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Provides the specification of a filter used to limit the intents in the response to only those that match the filter specification. You can only specify one filter and only one string to filter on. (dict) --- Filters the response from the ListIntents operation. The name of the field to use for the filter. The value to use for the filter. (string) --- The operator to use for the filter. Specify EQ when the ListIntents operation should return only aliases that equal the specified value. Specify CO when the ListIntents operation should return aliases that contain the specified value.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the field to use for the filter.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: The value to use for the filter.

nested_params.name: operator
nested_params.description: The operator to use for the filter. Specify EQ when the ListIntents operation should return only aliases that equal the specified value. Specify CO when the ListIntents operation should return aliases that contain the specified value.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: If the response from the ListIntents operation contains more results than specified in the maxResults parameter, a token is returned in the response. Use the returned token in the nextToken parameter of a ListIntents request to return the next page of results. For a complete set of results, call the ListIntents operation until the nextToken returned in the response is null.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot that contains the intent.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot that contains the intent.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The language and locale of the intents in the list.

nested_items.name: intentSummaries
nested_items.description: Summary information for the intents that meet the filter criteria specified in the request. The length of the list is specified in the maxResults parameter of the request. If there are more intents available, the nextToken field contains a token to get the next page of results.

nested_items.name: intentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier assigned to the intent. Use this ID to get detailed information about the intent with the DescribeIntent operation.

nested_items.name: parentIntentSignature
nested_items.description: If this intent is derived from a built-in intent, the name of the parent intent.

nested_items.name: inputContexts
nested_items.description: The input contexts that must be active for this intent to be considered for recognition.

nested_items.name: outputContexts
nested_items.description: The output contexts that are activated when this intent is fulfilled.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the output context.

nested_items.name: timeToLiveInSeconds
nested_items.description: The amount of time, in seconds, that the output context should remain active. The time is figured from the first time the context is sent to the user.

nested_items.name: turnsToLive
nested_items.description: The number of conversation turns that the output context should remain active. The number of turns is counted from the first time that the context is sent to the user.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the date and time that the intent was last updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates whether there are more results to return in a response to the ListIntents operation. If the nextToken field is present, you send the contents as the nextToken parameter of a ListIntents operation request to get the next page of results.
